description: Redux middleware that detects mutations between and outside redux dispatches. For development use only.
name: redux-immutable-state-invariant

scripts.example: cd example && rm -rf node_modules/redux-immutable-state-invariant && npm install && npm start
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test:coverage: rm -rf coverage/ && istanbul cover --report lcov _mocha -- --compilers js:babel/register test/*.spec.js --recursive
